code: import"./Post.css";import burger_img from"../../img/burger_grey.svg";import{useState}from"react";import Menu from"../Menu/Menu";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Post(props){const[isMenu,setIsMenu]=useState(false);let style1;function handleClick(){setIsMenu(true);console.log(isMenu);}let{id,name,rus,continent,capital,population,flag,map,s1,s,setS}=props;if(continent=="Europe"){continent="Европа";}if(continent=="South America"){continent="Южная Америка";}if(continent=="North America"){continent="Северная Америка";}if(continent=="Antarctica"){continent="Антарктика";}if(continent=="Asia"){continent="Азия";}if(continent=="Africa"){continent="Африка";}if(s[id].liked==true){style1="post1";}else{style1="post2";}if(s[id].deleted==false){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:style1,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"menu_position",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Menu,{isMenu:isMenu,setIsMenu:setIsMenu,s1:s1,setS:setS,id:id,s:s})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"Burger_wrapper",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"Burger",onClick:()=>{handleClick();},src:burger_img})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"margin",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:rus}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:["\u0421\u0442\u043E\u043B\u0438\u0446\u0430: ",capital]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:["\u0427\u0430\u0441\u0442\u044C \u0441\u0432\u0435\u0442\u0430: ",continent]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"population",children:["\u041D\u0430\u0441\u0435\u043B\u0435\u043D\u0438\u0435: ",population," \u0447\u0435\u043B."]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"flag",src:flag,alt:"\u0444\u043B\u0430\u0433",loading:"lazy",decoding:"asynchronous"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:map,target:"_blank",className:"map",children:"\u041A\u0430\u0440\u0442\u0430"})})]})]});}}export default Post;
